and the Brown's house, and I whispered to her: "Hack into the hospital's security,
Sweetie! We need to see how our young Mr. Brown is doing."

But when Vicky got a visual of Steve Brown's room, we saw three man standing
over the numb body of the boy.

"How long for the Varlos?" I shouted at Pius.

"Twenty Minutes away."

"That's too much... Send the police in to buy us some time!
And Vicky, get a facial of these three!"

I felt a slight tingling in my head. Things were getting interesting now!

Well, as things were developing at St. Jonas, Ross and Mayer obviously
were heading to the wrong place... But I wanted to get as many trumps
into my hands as possible: And getting the brother of our target, seemed
a high priority to me.

But while things were really getting out of control at St. Jonas Hospital,
Ross and Mayer could only report a dark, deserted house at the Brown's.

"Only irregularity: a broken window at the upper floor, obviously the room
of the boy." Ross informed shortly after. - And Mayer added: "According to
some notes in the kitchen, the parents are on business until Monday."

Perhaps these kids were careful, I thought to myself. Or they had turned
to the brother's house... However, earlier or later they would surely leave
their cover. I had to grin. They always did!

"Okay, boys", I instructed my watchers. "I want you to split up: Ross stays
at the Brown's and Mayer changes to the Woodmann's. I'll send the Twins
for Pizza and assistance."

"Copy that, Boss", Ross answered with a laughter. "But I want the big Pizza!"
"And I'll have the big twin!" Mayer added.

"Boys, don't mistake this..." I had to cut into their good humor, because I had
just looked on our satellite surveillance of the Hospital and had to realize how
a deadly shooting had started between the Varlos and the Police.

"This is no practice game! People are already dying."

SFI-Supervisor Charles Hawk's point of view


"Why on earth haven't they just followed our order and withdrew?!"

As soon as this Harpy had appeared, I knew we had found our target
and ordered the Police to back down. Pius had even patched me through
to their squad leader. But they wouldn't listen. And now they were dying
like flies...

What a terrible massacre! - And what a spectacle!

Being an expert of paranatural and supernatural occurrences,
I had seen a lot in my life... But watching this equally beautiful
and powerful babe killing all these men, was... fascinating in a
very perverse kind of way.

"Have we already marked her?" I turned to Vicky.

"Sure, Boss. PNS applied."

"Good." I nodded.

At least all these casualties weren't totally in vain.

Thanks to the "Paranatural Signature" system (which had been
invented just by our target's father Adam Woodman a year ago),
we would keep absolute track of our busty wunderkind now.

"She is killing the whole unit with those... bazookas of hers!"
Pius burst out, obviously captured by a similar fascination like me.
"And their weapons are without any effect against her... They only
managed to finally kill the Varlos."

Then he added with a worried look:
"They are calling headquarters. I guess, they will call for backup."

"Scramble their radios immediately." I ordered. "No more killing!
No more senseless cannon-fodder!" - And turning to Vicky, I added:
"Scramble all civil surveillance of this area as well. - This show is
for our eyes only!"

Vicky nodded, but then drew my attention back to the screen
of our own satellite surveillance.

I couldn't believe what I was seeing.

11111111112112221.content:
SFI-Supervisor Charles Hawk's point of view


Inflamed with rage and lust, our killer queen had wiped out the whole police-unit.
Or so it had seemed from our aerial perspective. But something was happening.

"Zoom closer!" I demanded from Vicky. "More... Much more closer!"

Our large screen narrowed onto the scene until we were so close, that we could
witness all emotions fighting on the face of our young target.

"She... she's crying." Vicky stated, while Pius reported just the contrary:
"What an evil smile!"

And both of them were right, as I could read either emotion on the girl's face:
deep sadness and pure malignity, horror and lust, disgust and nastiness...
There she stood: Liz Woodmann, 17-years young, helplessly overwhelmed
by her sudden supernatural powers... and being left all alone with herself.

Suddenly there was a short, white flickering on our screen, and then
the girl started moving again, raising her right arm and pointing a finger
at the nearest victim of her twin cannon's earlier assault.

With bated breath we witnessed, how a gleaming, green energy was lighting up
at her finger - and how this energy then jumped over onto the dead body, until...
well, until finally this shot policeman was starting to move again.

"Oh my God!" - "What the hell?" Vicky and Pius were speaking simultaneously
again, while I ordered: "Zoom on his wounds... His wounds!"

And so our unbelieving eyes saw, how his deep, deadly wounds were glowing
in this green energy, until several bullets were literally flowing out and then the
wounds were just closing and disappearing.

I'll never forget the relief and smile warming up at the face of the policeman.
And panning our sight to Liz Woddmann again, we could see how her face
was filling up with these emotions, while displacing all earlier malignity.

Slowly, she made her way back, moving from body to body, thereby reviving
one after the other. And though this process seemed to weaken he energies
more and more, the smile on her face and a captivating look of thankfulness
grew stronger at the same rate...

"Perhaps there is hope..." I began...


When suddenly the door to our operation room was opened with a loud push
and General Hyena marched in, followed by the girl's father, Adam Woodman.

"Excellent work, Charlie!" The General grunted, thereby giving a strong pat
on my back. "You and your team did a remarkably job - spotting and scouting.
Now you have earned yourselves a well-deserved break."

And on our dumbfounded looks, the General added:

"Bellatrix CU-3 is already on her way with the Alpha-Squad to take care
of Stage 2 of this operation."

Without a word, Vicky zoomed out of our focused view of the scene, until we
could see ten, dark helicopters ghostly approaching Liz Woodmann's position.

111111111122.content:
My mother Evelyn's point of view


Being isolated and kept hold in a closed cell really made me feel terrible,
especially since I didn't know how my beloved children were doing.
And I also worried about my husband Adam, though in my eyes he had
started the whole mess by his experiment on our little daughter Lizzy.

Soon enough I couldn't bear all my worries anymore and I cried for help.
I even stroke against the bars of my cell and tried to break free from it,
but to no avail. Seemingly this cage had been designed to hold much
more powerful creatures than a mother in despair.

After what seemed like an endless standstill of time, I finally could hear
voices and and footsteps approaching my position. At first I couldn't tell,
but then I recognized the voice of my dear Adam, while the other voice
seemed female, albeit with some strange artificial and at the same time
seductive sound.

And then I saw them: My husband, seemingly in good health and temper,
clad in a white lab coat. The person at his side, however, looked like a
strange mixture of an overly attractive human woman and... a robot.
Towering a good head over my husband, she looked very threatening
to me with all her metallic implants, sharp steel claws, massive breasts,
which were covered with a multitude of little, glistening thorns, and with
her right eye, which only seemed to consist of a red-glowing laser light.

"My dear Evelyn!" Adam addressed me trough the bars of my cage.
"I feel so sorry for everything, that has happened this night."

I dragged my eyes away from the cyborg and turned to my husband.

"Everything must seem so awful and wrong to you, my dear woman!
But you have to trust me: All of this is for the best and only the best
of our beloved daughter!"

And with this Adam turned to the Cyborg: "Open the cage and freeze her."

I couldn't believe, what I was hearing. But in no time the bars of my cage
were moving themselves apart to open an entrance to my cell and then
the powerful creature came for me, grabbed my body with her strong claws
and just crushed me down on the ground. Then she placed her mighty, heavy
body on mine and while her abundant, spikey breasts were dangling mere
inches above my face, I was stunned in fear of being crushed or suffocated
by her sheer mass.

"Very nice, Bella!" From the corner of my eye, I could see Adam approaching,
holding a syringe with a glowing green liquid in his right hand.

"It's a dose of our little daughter's blood and power, which I took from her
at the end of my experiment." Adam explained. "And by injecting this to you,
my dear Evelyn, we secure the life of our daughter."

Then I felt a short, sharp pain in my right arm... and I fell into unconsciousness.

1111111111221.content:
My mother Evelyn's point of view


I'd had that dream before.

A bad dream! A real nightmare!
But a tempting dream, as well...


Imagine, you would be all powerful!
You could do anything you wanted to.

How would you react?

Perhaps you would improve yourself at first:

Remove the flaws and hints of aging from your skin.
Make your nose a bit shorter. Your breasts a bit bigger.
And change you sweet, little love handles into muscle tone.

Then maybe you would want to help others:

Strengthen your weak grandfather with new vitality.
Encourage your timid nephew with a better self-assurance.
Give a little more brain and sympathy to your selfish daughter.

Or discover the cure for cancer.

Then you presumably would want to go out and show off:

Win the Olympics in high jump! Achieve the title of Miss Universe!
Build up a new trust for microelectronics. Or run for the Presidency.

Perhaps you would really try to make this world a better place at first.
And maybe you would do fine... for a notable period of time.

But, as you would be immortal, and as you could do everything and
get everything and be everything without any limitations or cutbacks,
at a specific point you would cease to care for the world around you.

Perhaps the ones that you once had been in love with have all died
long before. Or you had given immortality to them as well, but as they
had stayed around you for all these ages, you had finally got bored.

Or they were just getting too many.

Maybe you have filled the whole world and the whole universe with all
the people you like, all the people you love, all the ones you care for.
But suddenly the constant chatting, whispering... swarming... is only
making you ill.

Earlier or later you will stop fighting and trying for good.

And that is the point, where all the good dreams turn into a nightmare.

And this is the reason, why nobody should ever get absolute power!
And this is why any bearer of power should take this responsibility
only for a limited period of time...


In my dream, I never tried to heal the world.
I never tried to discover the cure for cancer.

In my dream, I transformed myself into an evil, motherly goddess,
and with my deadly powers I brought death and destruction to all
the children of the world. And most importantly - or most dreadfully:
With lustful greed, I even devoured the ones that I loved the most.

With sexual malignity, I dreamed to bring back those into my body,
which it had once given birth to.

You want to know why?

Frankly, I don't know why.

Perhaps to protect them from this evil world?
Or to get back what once had been mine?

To be honest, I don't care why!
I am sick of caring.


This was the awful nightmare, which came over me, after Adam
had injected our daughter's blood into my veins.

And I do remember now, where I had this nightmare before:
It had happened during the transformation of our daughter
this afternoon...

When I recovered my consciousness, I needed some time to realize
where I was - and even more crucial: who I was...

Hard as this was to accept: I was not in possession of my own body.

I tried to get a glance of this new body, but I couldn't.
My eyes - or rather the eyes of this body - weren't under my control.
And likewise, I couldn't turn my head or shift my limbs either.

Concentrating my mind on the inside of this body instead, I suddenly
felt a strange presence next to my thoughts. A cold, calculating kernel,
which somehow felt like watching me... analyzing me... studying me.

I tried to block this presence, but to no avail. Helplessly, I experienced
how the cyborg's mind was searching through my thoughts, memories
and emotions, thereby reading out everything it assessed relevant.

I wondered, whether I could follow, which information in particular
the cyborg was gathering from me. Giving myself in into this fusion
of our minds... bit by bit... and... byte by byte... I started to realize...
and visualize...

I saw trees of green... red roses too...
I hear my babies cry... and watch them grow...
and I think to myself...

But suddenly my dreadful nightmare is back again.
All this evil, lustful greed... this sexual malignity...

I try to object. I try to deny. I try to eliminate this dream... these thoughts!
But the cyborg inexorable unfurls and unfolds every detail, every sector.

I have a very bad feeling about the cyborg's interest in this nightmare!

Suddenly something in my mind had changed.

Mere seconds before, I had been worried and felt ashamed
about my dreadful nightmares. All my inner voices had yelled

But then there was silence. And carefreeness. And satisfaction.
And somehow the cyborg's mind had dissolved.

Or not really dissolved... as I still could feel its calculating capacity,

but the... alieness of the cyborg's mind somehow had faded away.

There was no conflict between the cyborg's and my own mind any more.
Obviously the cyborg had submitted itself to my will. Or it had absorbed

Either way, I felt like the one being in control now!

And to prove my impression right, I realized that I could control

In deep fascination I felt the substantial weightiness of the body,

Then I realized, that only my left eye offered a "real", colorful vision

Remembering how I had been intimidated by the cyborg's massive

Due to a special, extraterrestrial matter, these breasts could be both:

their very substance into those sharp, spikey and deadly globes, which
I had become acquainted with.

"What a killer body!" I had to think, knowing that I had only discovered

"But what am I to do with this body? - And where actually am I?"

Maybe this boy had noted, that I was shadowing him... Maybe not.

In any case, it had been a good training! And I am sure, that my suit
had provided excellent camouflage for my mission. - Like a shadow
I had floated through the nightly corridors of the Hospital... always
ready to intervene... and investigate every paranormal phenomenon.

"Number One won't be satisfied with your report, Foulinski!"
Otto snarled at me, while driving his heavy Black Omega to Headquarters.
I had to laugh at this. Otto really knew nothing about the arts of chasing.

"I mean... we got this high-priority-call from our contact at the Hospital,
but now we are returning... with nothing."

"Don't wrack your brains about this, Otto." I responded.
"I'm prepared to take full responsibility for our proceeding."

I had been on a lot of assignments with Otto before... and I had always
valued his advanced skills as a driver. In fact, he wasn't just a chauffeur.
Behind his wheel, Otto was a true fighter. He knew this city by heart, and
if you were followed, Otto could quickly get rid of any disliked company.

But it was hard for Otto to analyze a tactical situation.

I knew, I couldn't blame him for this.


Finally, we reached the old part of the harb... I mean, the secret location
of our Headquarter. When Otto stopped the Omega in front of Hall Seven,
I told him to wait for me... without attracting any unnecessary attention.

Then I cautiously left the car and - ducked like a weasel - I sprinted to the
entrance of Hall Seven. I spoke our secret password into the intercom,
then the automatic door opened... And I could enter the Headquarters.

"I am not satisfied with your report, Foulinski!"
Number One confessed, after I had finished my statement,
and I was very thankful, that he was being honest with me.

In fact, I knew that I had to value his straightforwardness
as a special honor of my tireless dedication.

"We got this high-priority-call from our contact at the Hospital
telling us, a boy of 21 years had been poisoned by a species
of snake, which was considered to be extinct for 2.000 years..."

I looked at Number One attentively and wondered to myself
what he was going to say.

But he didn't say anything more. He just looked back at me
like a spawning frog...

Then I understood.
Obviously Number One wanted me to continue his sentence.

"Well... ", I tried to sound very scientific, "in my humble opinion
that would mean that at least one of either the boy or the snake
has been at the wrong place at the wrong time..."

Pleased, I noted how the frog's spawning became more eager,
so I couldn't hold another conclusion:

"... which in turn means that one way or the other... the notion
of a journey through time is hereby sufficiently proven..."

Without any further word, the frog now got up and shuffled away.
I doubtlessly had inspired him to reconsider the whole matter.

Oh What a night! I always thought, we had a varied and interesting life.
But the diverse events of this night were just... beyond comparison!

Firstly Tim kissing me like never before... (sigh!)
Secondly this mad "Frankenstein" party at his parents'...
Thirdly this most disturbing dream kind of thing I ever had...
Fourthly, well... my brother Steve getting a date,
fifthly a date with busty Lizzy of all girls...
Sixthly Lizzy transforms into some snake woman and almost kills my brother.
Seventh getting questioned by two medics (like some host of an outbreak),
eightly some pseudo James Bond playing hide and seek with Tim and me...

Well, poor dear Mr. Secret Agent! What a shame, you didn't take this day off!
But how should you have known, you picked the unchallenged champions of
cops and robbers?

As soon as I was sure, that the "suit" (how Tim had called him) had decided
to follow my boyfriend, I checked the time - 01:27 - and muted my celly.
(Amazing, just how many people were still in the hospital at this late hour!)

Since the shortest way to the "Viper's Nest" only took a few minutes, I decided
to spend my spare time switching the roles with our chaser.

Knowing that Tim would move through the corridors of the hospital for a few
more minutes, so that I would have enough time for my head start, I quickly
moved to the main entrance and left the building, thereby checking that no
other agent was waiting outside. Then I looked for a safe hiding spot, to wait
for Tim and his "suit" to follow.

Five minutes and I saw Tim. Somehow he had gotten a doctor's white coat,
but he couldn't fool me. (I just knew his posture and his pace all too well.)
However, seemingly he had already got rid of the "suit".

So, Tim got rid of his white coat as well, then he turned southwards and with
a few strides he had disappeared into the darkness of the night.

After another five minutes I could observe how the "suit" left the hospital,
scratching his head, then taking his phone. Quickly I started the camera
of my celly, zoomed in and filmed him dialing (hoping that the definition
would be high enough to identify the number later on).

Another five minutes later a dark car picked the "suit" up and drove off
northwards. - And I was happy, that I had picked the number of the car.

01:49. Time to move to our meeting point!

already..." the doctor concluded - and I felt a little irritated by that.

If I already was fully recovered, why (and what) did he wanted
to test? And if he said, that my body was recovered, what did
that mean about my mind then?

And why had I been strapped to my bed like... a madman?
11111121.title: Later at the Hospital... (Steve's PoV)

choices: Kidnapping from the Hospital (the Suit's PoV)
At the Mercy of the Boy Scouts (Steve's PoV)
111111211.content:
My friend Steve's point of view


I couldn't really understand this.

Why was I being held captive in the Hospital?

Where were my parents? Or my sister?
Did they knew, that I was here?

Why wouldn't the doctor allow me, to give them a call?
Why wouldn't he release me, if my body was fully recovered?
What tests would he need me for?

Somehow I really got an uneasy feeling about this situation.

If I only could free myself of these straps and get away!
I didn't wanted to donate my organs yet... or play the human
sacrifice to the conjuration of some devil worshipers...

I decided to cry for help... as loud as I could.

Then suddenly the door of my sickroom swung open...
and James Bond rushed in.

(Bit by bit, I really doubted the sanity and reason of my mind.)
111111211.title: At the Mercy of the Halfgods in White(Steve's PoV)

choices: Detained for questioning... (Steve's PoV again)
1111112112.content:
My friend Steve's point of view


"But what about my Black Omega??!"

Obviously, this bulldozer of a man was still angry about the loss of his car.
I was relieved, that he wasn't putting the blame on me.

Actually, I would have voluntarily followed this James Bond-wannabe,
if he had just untied and assured me that he wanted to help...

But when he was threatening me with his mock gun (or was it a real one?),
I set off the fire-alarm... and this caused a chain of events, which I never had
believed possible...

Explosions, gunfights, helicopters, policemen, secret-agents, gangsters,
car crashing and amidst all these dangers this white-spandex-weirdo again...
- Honestly! I felt, like being in a really bad action-movie!

However, after a long race through our city (and a lot of collateral damage),
these boy scouts finally had brought me to this dark hall in the old part
of the harbor.

And now another weird, middle-aged man with thick glasses and a bald head
(the others were calling him Number One) wanted to know from me, what this
all was about.

If only I had known myself!
1111112112.title: At the Mercy of the Boy Scouts (Steve's PoV)

choices: Yes, tell them immediately, before Miss Sadistic gets started (Steve's PoV)
Make something up to protect Liz from those madmen (Steve's PoV)
11111121121.content:
My friend Steve's point of view


Now I felt a bit like James Bond.

They had seated me onto an iron chair and just as I had leaned back and
laid my arms onto the armrests, iron clasps had tightly closed themselves
around my neck, my wrists and my ankles.

Then a dark-haired young woman in an lab coat stepped into my sight.
Actually she looked quite attractive, but her good looks couldn't conceal,
that there was a very creepy sadism in her smile - and a see-through box
of various syringes and scalpels in her hand.

"Allow me to introduce myself..." she breathed at me with a wonderful voice.
"My name is Doctor Snakebite, but you can also call me Mistress..."

God, she was hot! If it weren't for her evil smile and all the deadly devices,
I could have momentarily fallen in love with her...

Then there was this baldhead again, asking whether I finally wanted to talk.

Given my inescapable position - and a nasty anticipation on the beautiful face
of Doctor Snakebite, I assured him of my full cooperation, though I still didn't
know what he wanted at all.

"You have been poisoned by a boa gargantua toxica..." the baldhead stated
matter-of-factly. "Who have you told about that?"

"A doctor at the Hospital told me, I'd been poisoned by a snake..." I answered
truthfully. "Apart from him I haven't spoken to anybody about snakes for years."

"You were chased by the Police and the Varlo Family. What have you told them?"

"Nothing. I never had any problems or any closer contact with the police before.
And I don't even know a Varlo Family..."

The baldhead didn't seem all too happy with my answers yet. With a glance
at the sadistic beauty at his side, he put a third question at me:

"Where exactly have you found the snake and where have you been bitten by her?"

I got a really bad feeling, as I just didn't know anything about this question again.
The only thing I really could remember (and never would forget) was my cinema-date
with Liz and that she had wanted to come to my place... to celebrate something and
show anotherthing to me... Then there was a blackout until I woke up in the Hospital.

But should I tell this to the baldhead?
11111121121.title: Detained for Questioning... (Steve's PoV)

choices: Doctor Snakebite exercises her deadly scalpels on Steve (Steve's PoV)
Doctor Snakebite plays another trick on Steve (Steve's PoV)
111111211211.content:
My friend Steve's point of view


So I told them all I could remember about my cinema-date with Liz up to the point,
where I couldn't remember anything more... but it was obvious that the baldhead
was not satisfied with that.

With a wink at Doctor Snakebite, the attractive, but evil-looking woman at his side,
he stated: "You might have told us the truth... but unfortunately that's not enough.
We need to know more about this boa gargantua toxica... and we need her DNA.
Therefore our treasured Doctor will drain this from you."
111111211211.title: Tell them all you know... (Steve's PoV)

choices: The evil Doctor drains a part of Liz' power from Steven's body (Snakebite's PoV)
1111112112112.content:
My friend Steve's point of view


With panic I glanced at her box of syringes and scalpels, but obviously the Doctor
had something else in her sadistic mind.

With a joyful giggle she sat her box to the ground, than unbuttoned her white lab-coat
to reveal more of her attractive and clearly well-trained body, clad only in tight, white
lacy lingerie under her coat. From my fixed perspective on the chair, she seemed like
an amazonian nurse to me... and I really got excited about her.

I couldn't believe my luck, when she sat down on me... like a cowgirl and swung her
beautiful, muscular legs around my hips. Pushing her pointy (though not overly large)
bra-clad breasts against my chest, she pressed her full lips onto mine and gave me
a deep kiss.

Quickly I responded to her charming game, but then I felt how her strong tongue
entered into my mouth and I felt a sharp pain, when I tried to welcome her with my
own tongue.

Frightened, I wanted to break our kiss and free my mouth from her. But since my neck
was fixed by the iron clasp of the chair and the Doctor now closed her strong fingers
around my head, there was no hope of escaping her.

In the meantime, her sweet kissing had grown into a deep sucking - and while I could
painfully feel how her strong, sharp tongue was creeping deeper into my mouth and
into my throat - I had to realize that by this procedure she was draining something
out of me.
1111112112112.title: Doctor Snakebite plays her trick (Steve's PoV)

choices: Caught in the middle of an evolving Snake Goddess (Steve's PoV)
11111121121121.content:
Doctor Snakebite's point of view


I could feel it.

This cute boy still had a rest of this powerful Snake-DNA in his body.
And I knew, with my special super-tongue, I could drain it out of him!

And then I could consume it. And I would evolve into a snake goddess!

I had waited so long for a chance like this.
But now all my dreams were being fulfilled.

Deeper and deeper my sharp tongue elongated into the boy's throat.
I sensed the terror and pain, I was inflicting upon him by this procedure,
and I liked the taste of it.

Desperately, he tried to stop me, but his position was without a chance.
His pretty face was in the hopeless grip of my pitiless, strong fingers,
as his young body was trapped by the iron clasps of our torture stool
and by the deadly embrace of my oh-so-strong thighs.

Hah! I already had crushed quite a lot of men with those muscular legs.
And it always had given me the highest pleasure of power and control.

But first things first! Above all, I had to get this snake-power now!

I could already feel it! I could already...

Yesss... Yeeeesssss, there it wassss...

Deep inside the boy's chest, I had hit the snake-power with my tongue.
Greedily I started to suck. Oh, that tasted so sweet!

Yeeesssss, I could sense it coming!

Nooow, I was transforming into a Snake Queen. A Snake Goddessss.
A bloodthirsty predator, who would devour all these loosers of the IPP.
All those simple-minded "Investigators of Paranormal Phenomena".

And then I would become even more powerful!
And I would bring even more pain and terror!

Haaaahhhh!
Thissss wasss the beginning of my reign over the world!
11111121121121.title: Snakebite gets her superpowers (Snakebite's PoV)

choices: Walking my Girlfriend home...
Questioned by the Blockheads... (Adam's PoV)
1112.content:
My father Adam's point of view


Well... ehm... my name is... Dr. Adam Woodman,
I am an investigator of paranatural and supernatural biogenetics,
and... since my time at the universities of Ale, Harvest and Palmo
I have been so privileged as to work for the "Super Forces Institute"
at the periphery of our charming town.

Now, as I was asked to add my point of view to this... description
of the recent events, I first of all... want to stress, that I never had
planned... or wanted for any of this to happen...

But... since the events have turned out to... have occurred... well,
in the way they did... I certainly will support this evaluation... with
all my personal and scientific integrity...

Pardon?


Well... ehm, yes. You want to hear about my personal experiences
during the transformation of my daughter, Liz Woodman...

Well, when this process of transformation had started, the involved
highly-paranatural energies had caused me and my... assistants to
transcend the deepest borders of our innermost childhood-desires
and livetime-experiences...

Which is clearly how I got driven away... by my paternal care and
fatherly love... to actually be confronted with a vision of my dear
daughter... which was... ehm... almost of an... erotic composition.


In fact, in a way you could compare this vision with Botticelli's
"Birth of Venus"... A most beautiful virgin, emerged from the sea,
matured into a full grown woman in only the blink of an eye...
ready to ascend the kingdoms of heaven... or conquer the world.

Yes... That's how I saw my daughter: like an ancient goddess.
An eternally young woman of divine beauty and immortal powers.
A caring goddess of fertility. An unrivaled empress of matriarchy.
A relentless huntress to her enemies... And the epitome of love
to her believing followers...

Oh yes... There I was: kneeling at her mighty feet. Kissing her toes.
Marveling at her endless, powerful legs. Not daring to raise my gaze
even higher... But knowing of the abundant, overshadowing glory
of her immense and immortal bosom... the endless flow of her wild,
golden hair...

She could have crushed me with her bare feet. Spike me with the
spear of the huntress. Shatter me with the gaze of her burning eyes.

But then, suddenly, there only was darkness... and she had vanished.
1112.title: A Vision of the Goddess... (Adam's PoV)

info.brief_description: My evil sister always had the body of a superheroine. Now she also gets the powers.
info.description:
My sister Liz always had the sexy body of a superheroine with her beautiful face,
her long, curly, blond hair, her immense breasts, slender hips, firm ass, perfect legs...
Now she also gets the powers of a superheroine!
Her evil, viperish character, however, will make her the perfect Villainess.


Characters:

Tim Woodman
Well, that's me, ahem, your main-narrator of this story:
a good-natured, quite normal, young man of 20 years.


Liz Woodman
My 17-years old sister, very attractive (especially if you like
her huge breasts), but at the same time she is very nasty.
Since an experiment of her father Adam Woodman, she has
acquired incredible super-powers - and (through an unlucky
chain of events) gradually gets really evil.


Adam Woodman
Our father (51), a really mad scientist... (Honestly!)
working for the "Super Forces Institute" (SFI),
a secret, governmental agency at "Point Black".
He is really excited about all the chaos and evil,
that has been caused by his super-experiment
on his daughter.



Evelyn Woodman
Our mother (39), very attractive for her age and very caring,
but a bit helpless, until she gets a dose of her daughter's powers...


Steve Brown
My best friend (21), who is very attracted by my sister...
(well... like all the other boys of our neighbourhood).
During a date with Super-Liz, however, he gets accidentally
poisoned by her in a game of snaky seduction.


Susan Brown
My incredible girlfriend (18) - and the most beautiful girl
of the world (at least in my eyes). Aside from that she is
Steve's sister... and no friend of my nasty sister at all.


Charles Hawk
My father's ambitious supervisor (38) at the SFI, who is ordered
to hunt down and kill my sister Liz, though he believes to sense
a potential of goodness in her.


Bellatrix CU-3
A deadly cyborg within the synthetic body of a sexdroid,
originally created by Adam Woodman as his masterpeace,
but very soon promoted to become sectional leader of the SFI
(due to her unequaled tactical and physical capabilities).


Albert -"The Suit"- Foulinski
A wannabee agent (25) of the dedicated group of
young "Investigators of Paranormal Phenomena" (IPP).


Doctor Snakebite
She used to be an attractive, sadistic scientist, working
for the "Investigators of Paranormal Phenomena" (IPP).
After draining some of Liz's power from Steve Brown,
however, she transformed into a bloodthirsty snakewoman.

Mr. Integrity
A weird man of unknown origin, who claims to be
a super-hero - and who wants to defend our city.


Feel free to add more characters.
